channel.title: Max Hit

item.title: Max Hit
item.dc:creator: @Impious_Lols Impious Lols
item.description:
@Impious_Lols wrote:

How do I make the max hit of something? Example I want to lower the hit of dragon claws special. Is this the right code?

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002 && specialAmount > 49){ specialAtkNPC(true, 25, -1, 6000); DCdown = 4; DCDamg = true; npcDamage(8); }

Read full topic
